QuestData.Title: Battle Victorious
QuestData.Description:
We have everything necessary to strike a blow against this Venture Company.
Our plan is sound, we are well prepared and we have the element of surprise.
We shall ride atop Ai'twen and reign chaos upon them with their very own weapons.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride Ai'twen and destroy the Venture Companies forces
QuestData.CompletionText: The Venture Companies defeat is at hand. Let's get to it!
QuestData.RewardText: This victory will be discussed for millennium to come. The Venture Co. is a resilient foe though, I am sure we will meet them again!
